actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to impose a minimum income tax on certain individuals and corporations with substantial incomes.

summary.text: Imposes a specified minimum tax under the Internal Revenue Code, in addition to other taxes, on individuals and on corporations whose income equals or exceeds $10,000. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 56)

titles.title: A bill to impose a minimum income tax on certain individuals and corporations with substantial incomes.
